review_blob: Great flavor profile without an overwhelming hop flavor. Roast and warm with a smooth finish.
This light yellow beer with a sweet aroma is my session beer when snowboarding. The creamy mouth feel and very slight hop flavor goes down too easily.

Really great root beer with alcohol added. Tastes like a really sweet A&W; that gets you drunk. Overall it is a little too sweet for me but it is fun to try. It would be really good as a root beer float.
beer_name: Small Town Not Your Fathers Root Beer (5.9%)

review_blob: The first thing you notice is the honey aroma of the beer. There is very little head and there is a watery mouth feel. This Belgian style beer has a nice citrus flavor with a hint of coriander.
No head black as the night color with a complex roasted malt aroma that is very complex. Notes of coffee chocolate and spice. Fairly strong hop flavor that lingers on the palate.
beer_name: North Coast Old Rasputin Russian Imperial Stout

review_blob: Light carmel color with little to no head. Lightly roasted malt flavor balanced well with light citrus hops. If it wasnt for the slightly high alcohol content this would be a good session beer.
Citrus hop flavor with a decent mouth feel for an IPA. I think the first sip is the best with this beer.
